#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}



int KvServer::prepareAndExecuteCommand(const uint64_t& oid, const string& op,
                               const string& k, const string& v) {
  
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();                             
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back(op);
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable>cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  return executeCommand(oid, cmd);
  
}

int KvServer::executeCommand(const uint64_t& oid,
                             shared_ptr<Marshallable>& cmd) {
  
  
  uint64_t init_index = 0, init_term = 0;
  shared_ptr<RaftServer> raftServer = dynamic_pointer_cast<RaftServer>(sp_log_svr_);
  uint64_t* ptr_index = &init_index, * ptr_term = &init_term;
 

  auto e = rrr::Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  pair<string, shared_ptr<IntEvent>> new_request(to_string(oid), e);
  eventMap.insert(new_request);

  if(!raftServer) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  bool startOk = raftServer->Start(cmd, ptr_index, ptr_term);
  if(!startOk || raftServer->IsDisconnected()) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  eventMap[to_string(oid)]->Wait(1000 * 1000);


  if(eventMap[to_string(oid)]->status_ == Event::DONE) {
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  } 
  
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */

  return prepareAndExecuteCommand(oid, "put", k, v);
  
  
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
 
  return prepareAndExecuteCommand(oid, "app", k, v);

}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */

  auto result = prepareAndExecuteCommand(oid, "get", k, "GET_VAL_OP");
  if(result == KV_SUCCESS)
    *v =  keyValMap[k];
  return result;
  
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  /* your code here */

  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  shared_ptr<RaftServer>raftServer  = dynamic_pointer_cast<RaftServer>(sp_log_svr_);
  string oid = v->data_[0];
  string operation = v->data_[1];
  string k  = v->data_[2];
  string val = v->data_[3];
  
  if(operation == "put") {
    keyValMap[k] = val;
  } else if (operation == "app") {
    auto it = keyValMap.find(k);
    if (it != keyValMap.end()) {
      it->second += val;
    } else {
      keyValMap[k] = val;
    }
  }

  if (raftServer && raftServer->role_ == kLeader && eventMap.count(oid)) {
    eventMap[oid]->Set(1);
    Log_info("Leader %d applied a command", raftServer->site_id_);
  }

}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
